page.title: 20Life Style
page.content: He first went to school in Beauchamp Roding and then Abbess . While there he had to get in the coal and do some gardening. He left school at l4; his first wage was 5s (25p) and he worked 8 hours a day and did not go on holiday. This gentleman's grandchildren still live in the area. All the people who chose to live here (i.e. have moved here) need their own transpoort as Public Transport covers very little of the area. They enjoy the peace and quiet of the countryside and gardening. They keep pets and have varied interests. Many enjoy local ecology i.e. bird watching etc. They like to keep in touch with cultural life, perhaps the theatre and use London frequently. The majority live in large old houses with big gardens.
